channel.title: Offline/online bot help

item.title: Offline/online bot help
item.dc:creator: @Jessica1294 Jessica1294
item.description:
@Jessica1294 wrote:

I put it under the cows “moo” saying but now i get a Public static void has and illeagel something. How do i fix i tried getting another one from another NPC handler for the same server but it still says it… heres error exactly

“illeagel Start of expression”
Public static boolean isdropping = false
It has an arrow pointing to the P in public boolean.[br][size=1]Posted on: July 03, 2007, 01:01:09 PM[/size][hr]I took this script out and it runs fine so whats wrong?

Read full topic

item.title: Offline/online bot help
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“Jessica1294, post:1, topic:119442”]Ok this is my exact script

[code]else if (npcs.npcType == 947)
{
if (misc.random2(1) <= 1)
{
npcs.updateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“Jessica”))
{
npcs.textUpdate = “The real jessica is online!”;
}
else
{
npcs.textUpdate = “The real jessica is offline!”;
}
}

} [/code]

Ok put it under any of the chat commands for NPCs then compile… How do u fix those errors?[/quote]

That last bracket, take it out.

Read full topic

item.title: Offline/online bot help
item.dc:creator: @Jessica1294 Jessica1294
item.description:
@Jessica1294 wrote:

Ok this is my exact script

[code]else if (npcs.npcType == 947)
{
if (misc.random2(1) <= 1)
{
npcs.updateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“Jessica”))
{
npcs.textUpdate = “The real jessica is online!”;
}
else
{
npcs.textUpdate = “The real jessica is offline!”;
}
}

} [/code]

Ok put it under any of the chat commands for NPCs then compile… How do u fix those errors?
